thread.title: Arizona police release video of fatal collision with Uber self-driving SUV

title: Arizona police release video of fatal collision with Uber self-driving SUV
text: March 21, 2018 / 10:43 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago Arizona police release video of fatal collision with Uber self-driving SUV Reuters Staff 1 Min Read SAN FRANCISCO, March 21 (Reuters) - Police in Arizona on Wednesday released a short video of a fatal collision between an Uber self-driving vehicle and a pedestrian. The video, taken from inside the sport utility vehicle, shows the vehicle driving along a dark road when an image of a woman walking a bicycle across the road appears in the headlights. The woman later died from her injuries. Reporting by Alexandria Sage
